quote: Yeah, reflections! The same, but different. Like twins - like blood brothers! And when you need something bad done, like punishment or revenge, you'll just ask me, and I will do it -
quote_letters: YEAH REFLECTIONS THE SAME BUT DIFFERENT LIKE TWINS - LIKE BLOOD BROTHERS AND WHEN YOU NEED SOMETHING BAD DONE LIKE PUNISHMENT OR REVENGE YOULL JUST ASK ME AND I WILL DO IT -
